title: Man dead and another wounded after shooting outside Sydney hotel
summary: New South Wales police said two people were shot multiple times by assailants who left Forest Lodge scene by car Get our breaking news email , free app or daily news podcast One man is dead and another has been taken to hospital with serious wounds after a shooting outside a Sydney hotel.
